<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/87202264f8e27f084c0e58f98aeb27fa5c6d5251|patch 8.2.0816: terminal test fails when compiled with Athena>
patch 8.2.0816: terminal test fails when compiled with Athena

Problem:    Terminal test fails when compiled with Athena.
Solution:   Do give an error when the GUI is not running. (hint by Dominique
            Pelle, closes #5928, closes #6132)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0816: terminal test fails when compiled with Athena · vim/vim@8720226
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0816: terminal test fails when compiled with Athena · vim/vim@8720226
attachments.text: Problem: Terminal test fails when compiled with Athena. Solution: Do give an error when the GUI is not running. (hint by Dominique Pelle, closes #5928, closes #6132)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/f7271e831614d15d173c7f562cc26f48c2554ce9|patch 8.2.0817: not enough memory allocated when converting string>
patch 8.2.0817: not enough memory allocated when converting string

Problem:    Not enough memory allocated when converting string with special
            character.
Solution:   Reserve space for modifier code. (closes #6130)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0817: not enough memory allocated when converting string · vim/vim@f7271e8
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0817: not enough memory allocated when converting string · vim/vim@f7271e8
attachments.text: Problem: Not enough memory allocated when converting string with special character. Solution: Reserve space for modifier code. (closes #6130)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/822ba24743af9ee1b5e7f656a7a61a38f3638bca|patch 8.2.0818: Vim9: using a discovery phase doesn't work well>
patch 8.2.0818: Vim9: using a discovery phase doesn't work well

Problem:    Vim9: using a discovery phase doesn't work well.
Solution:   Remove the discovery phase, instead compile a function only when
            it is used.  Add :defcompile to compile def functions earlier.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0818: Vim9: using a discovery phase doesn't work well · vim/vim@822ba24
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0818: Vim9: using a discovery phase doesn't work well · vim/vim@822ba24
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: using a discovery phase doesn&#39;t work well. Solution: Remove the discovery phase, instead compile a function only when it is used. Add :defcompile to compile def...

patch 8.2.0819: compiler warning for unused variable

Problem:    Compiler warning for unused variable.
Solution:   Remove the variable.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/6ff71d8b7fbdf667a2f119a2487302e240961816|patch 8.2.0820: Vim9: function type isn't set until compiled>
patch 8.2.0820: Vim9: function type isn't set until compiled

Problem:    Vim9: function type isn't set until compiled.
Solution:   Set function type early.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0820: Vim9: function type isn't set until compiled · vim/vim@6ff71d8
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0820: Vim9: function type isn't set until compiled · vim/vim@6ff71d8
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: function type isn't set until compiled. Solution: Set function type early.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/45a1508a229b1d1d2eb79cabe55a183dc18fd040|patch 8.2.0821: Vim9: memory leak in expr test>
patch 8.2.0821: Vim9: memory leak in expr test

Problem:    Vim9: memory leak in expr test.
Solution:   Do not decrement the length of the list of functions if the
            current function is not at the end.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0821: Vim9: memory leak in expr test · vim/vim@45a1508
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0821: Vim9: memory leak in expr test · vim/vim@45a1508
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: memory leak in expr test. Solution: Do not decrement the length of the list of functions if the current function is not at the end.
